trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration element that specifies an HTTPS transport for transmitting SOAP messages.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HttpsTransportElement"></xref> class.
Applies the settings of the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement"></xref> to this configuration element.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement"></xref> whose settings are to be applied to this configuration element.
Gets the type of this binding element.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of this binding element.
Copies the settings from the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement"></xref> to this configuration element.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement"></xref> whose settings are to be copied to this configuration element.
Creates a binding element from the settings in this configuration element.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement"></xref> whose properties are copied from the settings in this configuration element.
Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding element.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether the server requires the client to provide a client certificate as part of the HTTPS handshake.
`true` if SSL client authentication is required; otherwise, `false`.
